scripts.db:backup: node -e "const DbManager = require('./backend/db/database-manager'); new DbManager().createBackup('manual').then(r => console.log(r));"
scripts.db:restore: node -e "const DbManager = require('./backend/db/database-manager'); const name = process.argv[2]; if(!name) {console.log('Usage: npm run db:restore backup_name.db'); process.exit(1);} new DbManager().restoreFromBackup(name).then(r => console.log(r));"
scripts.db:list: node -e "const DbManager = require('./backend/db/database-manager'); new DbManager().listBackups().then(r => r.success && r.backups.forEach(b => console.log(b.name + ' - ' + b.age)));"
scripts.db:export: node -e "const DbManager = require('./backend/db/database-manager'); new DbManager().exportDatabase().then(r => console.log(r));"
